comments:
Overview Description:
   The probe of storage subsystems completed with error - Device service provider thread has died unexpectedly.
   After probe job failed, any subsequent discovery/probe jobs will all fails with The agent didn't respond
   The Data server_000001.log showed the following errors
11/20/06 12:21:07 PM SRV0068E: Device service provider thread has died unexpectedly.
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.discovery.RetryDeleteParameters.init(RetryDeleteParameters.java:42)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.gui.tape.common.model.TapeLibraryDBHelper.<init>(TapeLibraryDBHelper.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.RemoveMissingProcessor.<init>(RemoveMissingProcessor.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.RemoveMissingProcessor.<init>(RemoveMissingProcessor.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.probeAll(ExecProbeSS.java:292)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.doProbe(ExecProbeSS.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.run(ExecProbeSS.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.handler.scheduler.JobHndlrThread.run(JobHndlrThread.java:64)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.aperi.util.osgi.ServiceHelper.bindLocal(ServiceHelper.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.api.impl.DiskManagerConfigSvc.bindConfigService(DiskManagerConfigSvc.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.api.impl.DiskManagerConfigSvc.<clinit>(DiskManagerConfigSvc.java:42)
	... 9 more
11/20/06 12:21:07 PM SRV0021I: Shutting down service provider Device.
11/20/06 12:24:20 PM SRV0068E: Device service provider thread has died unexpectedly.
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.discovery.RetryDeleteParameters.init(RetryDeleteParameters.java:42)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.gui.tape.common.model.TapeLibraryDBHelper.<init>(TapeLibraryDBHelper.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.RemoveMissingProcessor.<init>(RemoveMissingProcessor.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.RemoveMissingProcessor.<init>(RemoveMissingProcessor.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.probeAll(ExecProbeSS.java:292)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.doProbe(ExecProbeSS.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.jobs.ExecProbeSS.run(ExecProbeSS.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.handler.scheduler.JobHndlrThread.run(JobHndlrThread.java:64)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Steps to Reproduce:
    Just run a probe of storage subsystem will end with the above error

Actual Results:
    The probe job failed with above error - The probe did finish all the collection of SS data

Expected Results: 
    The probe job finishs without error

Build Date & Platform:

    Aperi-20061117-200029.zip windows platform
